
{{alias}}( operation )
    Returns the BLAS matrix triangle string associated with a BLAS transpose
    operation enumeration constant.

    Parameters
    ----------
    operation: integer
        Operation enumeration constant.

    Returns
    -------
    out: string|null
        Operation string.

    Examples
    --------
    > var out = {{alias}}( {{alias:@stdlib/blas/base/matrix-triangle-str2enum}}( 'upper' ) )
    'upper'

    See Also
    --------
